title: 112_hr2837
content: The Act is titled the "Job Creation and Economic Growth Act" and includes amendments to the Budget Control Act of 2011. The title of the Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include "Job Creation and Economic Growth." Additional duties are added to the Joint Select Committee related to deficit reduction, job creation, and economic growth. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include "Job Creation and Economic Growth." The Joint Select Committee is tasked with reducing the deficit, creating jobs, and promoting economic growth over fiscal years 2012 and 2013. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include "Job Creation and Economic Growth." The Joint Select Committee is tasked with reducing the deficit, creating jobs, and promoting economic growth over fiscal years 2012 and 2013. In paragraph (3)(B), changes are made to improve deficit reduction reporting. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013. Changes are made to the joint committee report and voting procedures. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013. Changes are made to the joint committee report and voting procedures, including adjustments to voting language and the establishment of a special subcommittee to make recommendations on economic growth and employment. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013, with changes made to voting procedures and the establishment of a special subcommittee for economic growth and employment recommendations. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013, with changes made to voting procedures and the establishment of a special subcommittee for economic growth and employment recommendations. Legislative language for job creation must be introduced in the Senate and House if approved by the required majority. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013. If approved legislative language is not passed, it will be introduced in the Senate and House by designated members. The Budget Control Act of 2011 is amended to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013. Amendments are made to subsections (b) and (c) regarding the joint committee bill. Amendments are made to the Budget Control Act of 2011 to include job creation measures for fiscal years 2012 and 2013, specifically regarding the joint committee bill. The changes involve replacing instances of "the joint committee bill" with "a joint committee bill" in various subsections. Amendments to the Budget Control Act of 2011 involve replacing instances of "the joint committee bill" with "a joint committee bill" in various subsections. Additionally, the table of contents is amended to reflect these changes. Title IV of the Budget Control Act of 2011 is focused on the Joint Select Committee on Deficit Reduction, Job Creation, and Economic Growth.
